innovationPath.title: The Path of Innovation
innovationPath.card1Body: Cardano and the blockchain ecosystem depend on robust research to mature. To fill this gap, the Cardano Community, the Faculty of Law (UBA) and FinGurú joined forces, creating an academic space open to innovation to raise the standard of legal debate on the use of these technologies.
innovationPath.card2Body: A massive and vibrant event: 93 registered participants, 8 teams presenting proposals and a 12-hour day with expert panels and international speakers. Before an excellence jury, 3 winning teams were selected for the quality of their proposals.
innovationPath.card3Body: It did not end at the awards. Thanks to funding from Project Catalyst, the teams worked for months with specialized mentors, turning their initial pitches into academic papers with methodological rigor and theoretical depth.
innovationPath.card4Body: The result is free and tangible knowledge. These documents, licensed under Apache 2.0, are a concrete contribution from Argentina to enrich the global legal understanding of Blockchain technology.
